name: Do It Later
description:
Brutus is Ready!

Will you fight? I mean, you don't have to, Brutus will still be ready tomorrow. I mean eventually, you'll have to take care of Brutus, that's a given. But it doesn't have to be right now. Why not slap some of his minions around first? Just to get in the mood.

How to play

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim and fire
